name: Nobunaga's Shadow
description: Meet the sneakiest and deadliest ninja in all of Feudal Japan. Only half the village saw him coming, and even fewer cared.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
